terms.description: The main protagonist of the story, Mo Wuji is a determined cultivator who seeks to advance his skills and uncover the mysteries of the cultivation world.
An elder who provides Mo Wuji with a face mask for disguise. He is knowledgeable about the dangers in the God Domain Nest.
A significant location where powerful cultivators gather to seek treasures and insights during its incubation phase.
A Tier 8 immortal pill used for disguise, allowing the user to alter their appearance temporarily.
A kind and powerful elder from the Grand Sky Coalition who helps Mo Wuji escape the mine.
An organization formed by various factions and sects, opposing the Thousand Demon Ridge and seeking to maintain order in the cultivation world.
A cultivator from Evil Moon Valley who encounters Mo Wuji in the mine and is ultimately killed by him.
A Tier 3 spiritual herb used in pill refinement, particularly for the Spirit Strengthening Pill.
A pill designed to enhance the spiritual will of low-level cultivators, allowing them to strengthen their soul force.
A rare and valuable fruit that aids in the cultivation of Grand Luo Immortals, helping them gain enlightenment on the Immortal Dao.
An ancestor of the Heavenly Mortal Sect who provides guidance and support to Mo Wuji.
A cultivation stage that Mo Wuji is striving to advance through, with multiple levels indicating a cultivator's strength.
The fundamental principles that govern the cultivation world, which can be manipulated and understood by powerful cultivators.
Items used to set up formations or arrays, crucial for breaking through barriers in the cultivation world.
A cultivation stage that signifies a high level of power and mastery in the cultivation world.
A cultivation stage that is above the Golden Immortal stage, representing a significant increase in power and abilities.
A high cultivation stage that represents a significant level of power and mastery, often sought after by cultivators.
A channel through which a cultivator can understand and absorb the laws of Heaven and Earth, enhancing their cultivation.
A special channel that allows a cultivator to store and manipulate spiritual energy, aiding in their cultivation efforts.
A technique that allows a cultivator to move rapidly, enhancing their speed and agility.
An opposing organization to the Grand Sky Coalition, known for its aggressive tactics and control over various territories.
A term describing the chaotic and disordered laws of Heaven and Earth that can be found in certain areas, particularly during the incubation of the God Domain Nest.
A powerful and rare form of dao energy that emerges during the incubation of the God Domain Nest, sought after by many cultivators.
A formation set up by cultivators to achieve specific effects, often used in battles or to protect areas.
Methods and practices used by cultivators to enhance their abilities and progress through different cultivation stages.
A form of currency or resource used in the cultivation world, often exchanged for items or services.
A sect within the Grand Sky Coalition that plays a role in the larger conflict against Evil Moon Valley.
A powerful energy that cultivators seek to understand and harness, often associated with the creation of new laws.
Individuals who practice cultivation, seeking to enhance their abilities and achieve higher levels of power.
An event or location where pill refiners gather to share knowledge, trade resources, and compete in their craft.
Special pills used by cultivators to enhance their abilities, often containing various spiritual herbs and ingredients.
A title given to experienced and respected members within a sect or organization, often responsible for guiding younger cultivators.
Advanced techniques that allow cultivators to harness the power of the Dao, enhancing their abilities and understanding of the world.
A realm where powerful cultivators reside and practice their craft, often filled with opportunities and dangers.
A higher realm of existence that cultivators aspire to reach, representing a significant increase in power and understanding.
Items and materials used by cultivators to enhance their abilities, including spiritual herbs, pills, and artifacts.
Powerful artifacts that can be used by cultivators to enhance their abilities or provide unique effects.
A state of being that cultivators aim to achieve, allowing them to harness the full potential of their spiritual will.
Highly powerful cultivators who have reached the Heavenly God Stage, often serving as leaders or protectors within the cultivation world.
